_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Velocity + Geyser + Floodgate
author: parker@parkervcp.com
description: Velocity is a Minecraft server proxy with unparalleled server support, scalability, and flexibility.

installation.script:
#!/bin/ash
# Velocity+GeyserMC+Floodgate Installation Script
#
# Server Files: /mnt/server
PROJECT=velocity
if [ -n "${DL_PATH}" ]; then
echo -e "Using supplied download url: ${DL_PATH}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=`eval echo $(echo ${DL_PATH} | sed -e 's/{{/${/g' -e 's/}}/}/g')`
else
VER_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r --arg VERSION $VELOCITY_VERSION '.versions[] | contains($VERSION)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_VERSION=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT} | jq -r '.versions' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
if [ "${VER_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
echo -e "Version is valid. Using version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} version"
VELOCITY_VERSION=${LATEST_VERSION}
fi
BUILD_EXISTS=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION} | jq -r --arg BUILD ${BUILD_NUMBER} '.builds[] | tostring | contains($BUILD)' | grep -m1 true`
LATEST_BUILD=`curl -s https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION} | jq -r '.builds' | jq -r '.[-1]'`
if [ "${BUILD_EXISTS}" == "true" ]; then
echo -e "Build is valid for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}. Using build ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
else
echo -e "Using the latest ${PROJECT} build for version ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
BUILD_NUMBER=${LATEST_BUILD}
fi
JAR_NAME=${PROJECT}-${VELOCITY_VERSION}-${BUILD_NUMBER}.jar
echo "Version being downloaded"
echo -e "MC Version: ${VELOCITY_VERSION}"
echo -e "Build: ${BUILD_NUMBER}"
echo -e "JAR Name of Build: ${JAR_NAME}"
DOWNLOAD_URL=https://api.papermc.io/v2/projects/${PROJECT}/versions/${VELOCITY_VERSION}/builds/${BUILD_NUMBER}/downloads/${JAR_NAME}
fi
cd /mnt/server
echo -e "Running curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}"
if [ -f ${SERVER_JARFILE} ]; then
mv ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${SERVER_JARFILE}.old
fi
curl -o ${SERVER_JARFILE} ${DOWNLOAD_URL}
mkdir plugins
echo -e "Downloading Geyser"
GEYSER_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.velocity.sha256`
curl -o plugins/geyser-velocity.jar -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/geyser/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/velocity
echo "${GEYSER_HASH} plugins/geyser-velocity.jar" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Geyser SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm plugins/geyser-velocity.jar
exit 1
fi
echo -e "Downloading Floodgate"
FLOODGATE_HASH=`curl -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest | jq -r .downloads.velocity.sha256`
curl -o plugins/floodgate-velocity.jar -L https://download.geysermc.org/v2/projects/floodgate/versions/latest/builds/latest/downloads/velocity
echo "${FLOODGATE_HASH} plugins/floodgate-velocity.jar" | sha256sum -c
RESULT=$?
if [[ $RESULT -eq 0 ]]; then
echo "Floodgate SHA256 match"
else
echo "SHA256 does not match! Aborting..."
rm plugins/floodgate-velocity.jar
exit 1
fi
mkdir -p plugins/Geyser-Velocity/
if [[ ! -f "plugins/Geyser-Velocity/config.yml" ]]; then
echo -e "Downloading default Geyser config"
curl -o plugins/Geyser-Velocity/config.yml https://raw.githubusercontent.com/GeyserMC/Geyser/master/core/src/main/resources/config.yml
sed -i 's/: online/: floodgate/g' plugins/Geyser-Velocity/config.yml
fi

variables.name: Velocity Version
variables.description:
The Velocity Proxy version to download.

Set to 'latest ' the download the last stable build.
Set to '1.1.x-SNAPSHOT' to get the latest dev build.

variables.name: Server Jar File
variables.description:
Server Jarfile, by default this is set to 'velocity.jar'.
Set it to otherwise if you wish to have a different jarfile name.

variables.name: Build Number
variables.description:
The build number for the velocity release.

Leave at latest to always get the latest version. Invalid versions will default to latest.

variables.name: Geyser Port
variables.description:
The UDP port that Geyser will listen on

"-1" will forcibly stop Geyser
"server" will have Geyser listen on the same port as the TCP server
